Summary: ORONGE STILL LIGHT STAYED STILL THEN MOVED FAST AWAY IN TO ORBIT
trends: There has been one other sighting in Corby
There were no other sightings in Corby on or around January 1st 2001
divs: Sighting DetailsMYSELF MY GIRLFREIND AND MY 10 YEAR OLD SON HAVE BEEN WALKING HOME FROM MY PARENTS HOUSE WE ARE ALL SOBER MYGIRLFREIND IS 5 MONTHS PREGNENT I HAD 4 BEERS AS WE WALKED MY GIRLFREIND SEEN AN ORANGE LIGHT IN THE CLOUDS AND WE LOOKED IT MOVED VERY FAST ACROSS THEN SEEM TO SLOW DOWN BUT IT WAS GETTING SMALLER IN SIZE AND WE REALIZED THAT IT WAS ACTUALLY MOVING AWAY FROM US UNTIL IT DISAPEARED, EARLIER IN THE NIGHT MY PARENTS SEEN THE LIGHT AND SHOUTED US TO COME AND HAVE A LOOK BUT WE THOUGHT IT WAS JUST A AEROPLANE BUT WHAT WE ALL SEEN WAS DEFINETLY NOT AN AEROPLANE IT WAS SOMETHING I HAVE NEVER SEEN BEFORE.
